name: IHRME
description: IHRME's global network of seminar designers is drawn from the world's HRM thought leaders. IHRME resources provide the HRM profession with practical and applicable techniques and strategies that work.The HRM profession is in a dynamic period of change these days. HR practitioners are called upon to be strategic business partners with increasing responsibility for organizational success.
business_objectives: Build a More Diverse and Inclusive Workforce
Headline: Effectively manage, motivate and develop your people
ShortDescription: Effectively managing, motivating and developing people are key to organizational success. Organizations that succeed understand the value of employee commitment and contribution
enhanced_description: IHRME provides comprehensive learning and development resources, including seminars designed by a global network of HRM thought leaders. Their offerings equip HR professionals with practical and applicable techniques and strategies for effectively managing, motivating, and developing their people. The focus is on fostering employee commitment and contribution, contributing to organizational success, and addressing contemporary HR challenges such as retaining key employees and building a more diverse and inclusive workforce. IHRME offers onsite training options and operates within the Corporate LMS and Training & Development sectors, utilizing learning analytics and focusing on diversity and inclusion initiatives.
key_use_cases: Developing HR professionals' skills and strategies
Building a more diverse and inclusive workforce
Providing onsite employee development and training

Focus on practical and applicable HR techniques and strategies
Expertise in addressing contemporary HR challenges, including diversity and inclusion
implementation_scenarios: Integration with or provision of Corporate Learning Management Systems
